## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                           | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `theme`  | `theme`   | The theme color defined in the color palette. The default is primary. | `string` | `undefined` |

| Event       | Description | Type                  |
| ----------- | ----------- | --------------------- |
| `tabChange` |             | `CustomEvent<string>` |
